channel.title: Char Files
channel.description: My character files wont save, its saying "error writing files". I have no idea how to fix this.

item.title: Char Files
item.dc:creator: @Dyl4n20 Dyl4n20
item.description:
@Dyl4n20 wrote:

EDIT: I got it, I’m an idiot. It was common sense. Sorry, it was too late for me to be thinking.

Read full topic

item.title: Char Files
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Dyl4n20:

Bump…

Why are you still bumping this? He gave you the answer. I don’t mean to be an asshole or anything but can you read?

“Java.io.FileNotFoundException”
“The system cannot find the path specified”

Clearly the system cannot find the file!! Make sure the parh to your character files are correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Char Files
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Dyl4n20, post:12, topic:466281”]src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:526: error: illegal start of type
return true;
^
src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:526: error: ‘;’ expected
return true;
^
src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:530: error: class, interface, or enum e
xpected
}
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

I don’t believe you added it right. I didn’t include the closing brace beforehand.

Replace your entire file with this

http://pastie.org/5338317

Read full topic

item.title: Char Files
item.dc:creator: @Dyl4n20 Dyl4n20
item.description:
@Dyl4n20 wrote:

Exactly, I just don’t know how to fix it. I’ve never had this issue before. ever.

Read full topic

item.title: Char Files
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Well your problem is most likely in PlayerSave, because thats what writes your file for your first login and updates the player files as you do new things get new items and so on. Our PlayerSaving file tells us when to save the file after logout, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Char Files
item.dc:creator: @Dyl4n20 Dyl4n20
item.description:
@Dyl4n20 wrote:

src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:526: error: illegal start of type
return true;
^
src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:526: error: ‘;’ expected
return true;
^
src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:530: error: class, interface, or enum e
xpected
}
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Char Files
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Replace

catch(IOException ioexception) { Misc.println(p.playerName+": error writing file."); }

With

catch(IOException ioexception) { Misc.println(p.playerName+": error writing file."); ioexception.printStackTrace(); }

Re run, and post the error that pops up.

Read full topic

You’re seriously stupid if you think that everythings ‘ok’ with no errors.
